remarks: Part of proof of part 16 in [Baer] p. 50 line 23, Fs=G, except that we use the original vector space scalars for the range.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hgmaprn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmaprn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmaprn.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmaprn.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmaprn.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmaprn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmaprnN $p |- ( ph -> ran G = B ) $.
